scripts.build-core: ng build @myrmidon/cadmus-core --prod && ng build @myrmidon/cadmus-material --prod && ng build @myrmidon/cadmus-api --prod && ng build @myrmidon/cadmus-ui --prod && ng build @myrmidon/cadmus-state --prod && ng build @myrmidon/cadmus-ui-pg --prod
scripts.build-pg: ng build @myrmidon/cadmus-admin --prod && ng build @myrmidon/cadmus-browser-hierarchy --prod && ng build @myrmidon/cadmus-item-editor --prod && ng build @myrmidon/cadmus-item-list --prod && ng build @myrmidon/cadmus-item-search --prod && ng build @myrmidon/cadmus-layer-demo --prod && ng build @myrmidon/cadmus-login --prod && ng build @myrmidon/cadmus-reset-password --prod && ng build @myrmidon/cadmus-thesaurus-editor --prod && ng build @myrmidon/cadmus-thesaurus-list --prod && ng build @myrmidon/cadmus-user --prod
scripts.build-all: npm run-script build-core && npm run-script build-p-general && npm run-script build-p-philology && npm run-script build-pg
